    <script>
      //Ensure namespaces have been defined, without overwriting them.
      if(typeof MTVN == "undefined") MTVN = {};
      if(typeof MTVN.config == "undefined") MTVN.config = {};
      if(typeof MTVN.config.btg == "undefined") MTVN.config.btg = {};
      if(typeof MTVN.siteParams == "undefined") MTVN.siteParams = {};
      if(typeof MTVN.config.btg.DoubleClick == "undefined") MTVN.config.btg.DoubleClick = {};

      //Configure auto-firing of ads.
      MTVN.config.btg.DoubleClick.auto = false;
      MTVN.config.btg.DoubleClick.onDemand = true;
      MTVN.config.btg.DoubleClick.disableDeviceManagement = true;

      //Set page level ad unit values
      var vmn_page_data = {
          "metadata" : {
              "property"			: "br_ahnegao.com.br"
          },
          "mappings" : {
              "ad-unit" : {
                  "1"       			: "@property"
              },
              "key-values" : { },
              "exclusion-categories"		: ""
          },
          "settings" : {
              "default_reload_interval"	: -1
          }
      };
    </script>

    <!-- MUST INCLUDE - Source-in Coda from Aria -->
    <script src="http://btg.mtvnservices.com/aria/coda.html?site=mtv.com.br&amp;Ads_DFP=1&amp;Ads=0&amp;stage=1"></script>

    <!-- MUST INCLUDE - Send Page Call -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        // SETUP PAGENAME & HIERARCH VALUES
        var indexVals=["index.php","index.html","index.jhtml"];
        var prfx = 'blogs/partners/ahnegao.com.br'; //THIS VALUE SHOULD ALWAYS CONTAIN THE 'blogs/partners' PREFIX ALONG WITH THE 'site' PARAM VALUE.
        var hr = prfx+btg.config._defaultPageName;
        var pn = '/'+hr;

        //Replace all possible index.* used with 'index'
        for (var i = 0; i < indexVals.length; ++i) {
          if (pn.indexOf(indexVals[i]) > -1 )
        var sRegExInput = new RegExp(indexVals[i], 'ig');
       pn = pn.replace(sRegExInput ,'index');
       hr = hr.replace(sRegExInput ,'index');
        }

        // SEND OMNITURE PAGE CALL FOR TRAFFIC REPORTING
        btg.Controller.sendPageCall(
        {
      pageName: pn,
      channel: 'blogs',
      hier1: hr,
      hier2: hr
        });
    </script>

          <article class="le-post" id="post-101196" class="post-101196 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-imagens tag-crazy-conscious">
	<header class="le-header">
		<!-- se é alguma das paginas... -->
				<div class="le-data">
			<span class="dia">28</span>
			<span class="mes">mar</span>
			<span class="ano">2017</span>
		</div>
				<div class="le-title">
		<h2><a href="http://www.ahnegao.com.br/2017/03/apenas-mais-uma-tatuagem-em-ingles-que-deu-muito-errado.html" rel="bookmark">Apenas mais uma tatuagem em inglês que deu muito errado</a></h2>	</div>
	</header><!-- .entry-header -->

	<div class="le-content">
		<!-- se é página com posts... -->
								<div class="le-inner-content">
		<p><img class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-101197" src="http://www.ahnegao.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/ingles.jpg" alt="" width="450" height="877" srcset="http://www.ahnegao.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/ingles.jpg 450w, http://www.ahnegao.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/ingles-154x300.jpg 154w" sizes="(max-width: 450px) 100vw, 450px" /></p>
<p>Explicando pra quem não manja: ele faz parte daquelas pessoas que trocam &#8220;mas&#8221; por &#8220;mais&#8221;, então ele tatuou &#8220;plus&#8221;, que significa &#8220;mais&#8221;, só que na matemática, tipo em &#8220;três mais dois&#8221;.</p>
<p>Resumindo: JOEL SANTANA IS DEAD.</p>

<!-- Easy Plugin for AdSense V8.67 -->
<!-- [leadout: 0 urCount: 0 urMax: 0] -->

<article class="le-post" id="post-101171" class="post-101171 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-videos tag-explosao-de-fofura">
	<header class="le-header">
		<!-- se é alguma das paginas... -->
				<div class="le-data">
			<span class="dia">28</span>
			<span class="mes">mar</span>
			<span class="ano">2017</span>
		</div>
				<div class="le-title">
		<h2><a href="http://www.ahnegao.com.br/2017/03/menina-confunde-aquecedor-quebrado-com-robo-e-conquista-internet.html" rel="bookmark">Menina confunde aquecedor quebrado com robô e conquista a internet</a></h2>	</div>
	</header><!-- .entry-header -->

	<div class="le-content">
		<!-- se é página com posts... -->
								<div class="le-inner-content">
		<p>Eis um pequeno teste pra ver se você tem coração. Se você nem sequer ameaçar soltar um OOOOOOUUUUNNNNN depois de ver isso, acho que nada mais será capaz de derreter o gelo no seu peito:</p>
<p><iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/h1E-FlguwGw?rel=0&amp;showinfo=0" width="640" height="360" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe></p>
<p>Quando ela falou &#8220;te amo robô&#8221; eu senti como se tivesse derretendo por dentro de tanta fofura. Pelo jeito que as coisas são alguém vai fazer um robô pra essa menina&#8230;</p>

<!-- Easy Plugin for AdSense V8.67 -->
<!-- [leadout: 1 urCount: 1 urMax: 0] -->
<div class="ezAdsense adsense adsense-leadout" style="text-align:center;margin:12px;"><script type="text/javascript"><!--

//-->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript"
src="//pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js">
</script></div>
<!-- Easy Plugin for AdSense V8.67 -->

<article class="le-post" id="post-101174" class="post-101174 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-gifs tag-fechou-aqui">
	<header class="le-header">
		<!-- se é alguma das paginas... -->
				<div class="le-data">
			<span class="dia">28</span>
			<span class="mes">mar</span>
			<span class="ano">2017</span>
		</div>
				<div class="le-title">
		<h2><a href="http://www.ahnegao.com.br/2017/03/esse-caminho-agora-esta-fechado.html" rel="bookmark">Esse caminho agora está fechado</a></h2>	</div>
	</header><!-- .entry-header -->

	<div class="le-content">
		<!-- se é página com posts... -->
								<div class="le-inner-content">
		<div style="position: relative; padding-bottom: 57%;"><iframe style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0;" src="https://gfycat.com/ifr/TornFarflungAngwantibo" width="100%" height="100%" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe></div>
<p>Sabem aquelas esteiras rolantes que geralmente tem em supermercados em que as pessoas descem com carrinhos cheios de compras pro estacionamento? Imagina colocar uma placa dessas naquela esteira&#8230;</p>
<p>O dia não acabaria sem pelo menos 20 mortes.</p>

<!-- Easy Plugin for AdSense V8.67 -->

<article class="le-post" id="post-101168" class="post-101168 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-jogos tag-chicken-scream">
	<header class="le-header">
		<!-- se é alguma das paginas... -->
				<div class="le-data">
			<span class="dia">28</span>
			<span class="mes">mar</span>
			<span class="ano">2017</span>
		</div>
				<div class="le-title">
		<h2><a href="http://www.ahnegao.com.br/2017/03/chicken-scream-o-jogo-onde-voce-joga-gritando.html" rel="bookmark">Chicken Scream: o jogo onde você joga gritando</a></h2>	</div>
	</header><!-- .entry-header -->

	<div class="le-content">
		<!-- se é página com posts... -->
								<div class="le-inner-content">
		<p>Sempre que eu vejo um joguinho inovador eu sinto a necessidade de postar aqui, e o jogo da vez é <strong>Chicken Scream.</strong></p>
<p>Isso nem é publicidade, é que esse jogo me fez ter tanta vergonha de mim mesmo que eu achei que todos deveriam se sentir assim.</p>
<p>O jogo é simples: é uma galinha que tem que passar por obstáculos, porém ela só se mexe quando você fala, e pula quando você grita. Exemplo:</p>
<p><iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XxOk1W8awBI?rel=0&amp;showinfo=0" width="640" height="360" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe></p>
<p>Você não precisa gritar como galinha, mas além de ser mais realista, é mais constrangedor, o que é a graça do jogo: passar vergonha. Jogue nas filas de bancos, velórios, casamentos&#8230; todo mundo vai entender!</p>
<p>Tem pra <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.perfecttapgames.chickenscream" target="_blank">Android</a> e <a href="https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/chicken-scream/id1215659912?mt=8" target="_blank">iOS</a>.</p>

<!-- Easy Plugin for AdSense V8.67 -->
<!-- [leadout: 3 urCount: 3 urMax: 0] -->
<div class="ezAdsense adsense adsense-leadout" style="text-align:center;margin:12px;"><script type="text/javascript"><!--

//-->

<article class="le-post" id="post-101205" class="post-101205 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-imagens tag-pi">
	<header class="le-header">
		<!-- se é alguma das paginas... -->
				<div class="le-data">
			<span class="dia">28</span>
			<span class="mes">mar</span>
			<span class="ano">2017</span>
		</div>
				<div class="le-title">
		<h2><a href="http://www.ahnegao.com.br/2017/03/voce-e-pi.html" rel="bookmark">Você é PI?</a></h2>	</div>
	</header><!-- .entry-header -->

	<div class="le-content">
		<!-- se é página com posts... -->
								<div class="le-inner-content">
		<p><img class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-101199" src="http://www.ahnegao.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/pi.jpg" alt="" width="480" height="932" srcset="http://www.ahnegao.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/pi.jpg 480w, http://www.ahnegao.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/pi-155x300.jpg 155w" sizes="(max-width: 480px) 100vw, 480px" /></p>
<p>PISSEXUAL é o indivíduo que se relaciona com 3,14 pessoas ao mesmo tempo. É um gosto peculiar que envolve bastante sacanagem e uma mutilação pequena.</p>

concessionária responsável.

                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><style>

.agrupamento-vertical-simples .glb-hl-style-informe-publicitario .chapeu {
    color: #fff !important;
}

.nano>.pane {
    z-index: 12;
}
</style><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    window.onload= function() {
         if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
     }
})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 28/03/2017 21:06:02 --></html>

   <section id="home-unlock" class="section">
      <div class="container">
         <article class="wow fadeInUp">
            <h1>Performance</h1>
            <strong>La mayor CDN del mundo para optimizar el desempeño de sus negocios online.</strong>
            <h2>Haga que su inversión valga la pena.</h2>
            <p>Exceda le ayuda a maximizar el retorno de sus inversiones en tecnología de CDN. Trabajamos junto a nuestros clientes ayudando a identificar los principales problemas de rendimiento, ofreciendo y configurando soluciones a precios competitivos. Nuestro equipo de soporte está disponible 24x7, y por cualquier duda o problema, basta sólo con llamar y comunicarse con uno de nuestros especialistas.</p>
            <span><a href="performance.html" title="Go Now" class="hvr-float-shadow">VER MÁS</a></span>
         </article>
      </div><!--end class container-->
   </section><!--end id home-unlock-->

   <section id="home-secure" class="section">
      <div class="container">
         <article class="wow fadeInUp">
            <h1>Seguridad</h1>
            <strong>Para su sitio y/o aplicación web.</strong>
            <h2>Más del 30% de todos los sitios de empresas deben ser objetivo de al menos un ataque DDoS.</h2>
            <p>Cada día surgen nuevas amenazas a la seguridad en línea, más frecuentes y sofisticadas. Exceda busca estar siempre un paso adelante. Por eso, nuestros clientes cuentan con soluciones de seguridad eficaces y actualizadas para proteger sus aplicaciones. </p>
            <span><a href="security.html" title="Go Now" class="hvr-float-shadow">VER MÁS</a></span>
         </article>
      </div><!--end class container-->
   </section><!--end id home-secure-->

   <section id="home-stream" class="section">
      <div class="container">
         <article class="wow zoomInRight">
            <h1>Streaming</h1>
            <strong>Sólo se cuenta con unos pocos segundos para complacer a los espectadores.</strong>
            <h2>Garantice la mejor experiencia de visualización del contenido. </h2>
            <p>El rendimiento de los videos en línea es crucial en la interacción con los consumidores y espectadores. Las soluciones de Exceda le permitirán incorporar el streaming a su estrategia en línea, con un rápido inicio de la transmisión, así como una reproducción estable y confiable.</p>
            <span class="hvr-float-shadow"><a href="streaming.html" title="Go Now">VER MÁS</a></span>
         </article>

            <strong>Monitoree y optimice el rendimiento de su sitio web y streaming.</strong>
            <h2>Puede modificar lo que está sucediendo. </h2>
            <p>Exceda proporciona herramientas para llevar a cabo diversos análisis detallados para detectar las oportunidades de optimización del desempeño y/o disponibilidad de su sitio web.</p>

            <span>
               <!--<strong>Acerca de nosotros</strong>-->
               <p>Desde 2002, Exceda ha ofrecido el más completo portafolio especializado en desempeño, seguridad y disponibilidad online, así como el análisis e inteligencia de datos observados en este mismo medio. Exceda es el mayor aliado estratégico de Akamai Technologies, Inc. para toda la región latinoamericana, operando en 10 países en la actualidad. Dado nuestro compromiso contante con la innovación, siempre estamos interesado en escuchar sobre nuevos partners o proveedores de soluciones.</p>
               <em><small>Powered by Agile<br />Copyright &copy; 2016 - Exceda</small> <img src="../images/footer-akamai.jpg" alt="Akamai" /></em>

<div id="noticia" class="noticia">
       

                         <div id=alinhamentofoto class=alinhamentofoto>
                  <table width=195 cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0">
                    <tr><td class=credito><p>Projeto UFMG Digital<br />
<a href="https://www.ufmg.br/online/arquivos/anexos/revoada%20%281%29.png"><img alt="revoada%20%281%29.png" src="https://www.ufmg.br/online/arquivos/anexos/revoada%20%281%29-thumb.png" width="380" height="380" /></a></p></td></tr>
                  </table>
              </div>
                 

   <div id="destaques" class="destaques">
      <h1>Garças do Bocados de Gentileza anunciam o Ano Novo em voo livre no site da UFMG</h1>
      <span class="data">segunda-feira, 23 de dezembro de 2013, às 16h27</span>
       
<!-- twitter -->       
<span style="display:block; height:5px;"></span>
<div style="float: left;width:140;" id="f"><a href="https://twitter.com/ufmgbr" class="twitter-follow-button" data-show-count="false" data-lang="pt">Seguir o @ufmgbr no Twitter</a>
<script src="https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
</div>
<!-- FB recomendar -->
<div style="float: left; width: 120px;">
<div id="fb-root"></div><script
src="https://connect.facebook.net/pt_BR/all.js#appId=173321486076253&amp;xfbml=1"></script><fb:like
href="" send="false" layout="button_count" width="120"
show_faces="false" action="recommend" font=""></fb:like>
</div>
<!-- google mais -->
<div style="float: left; width: 60px;">
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://apis.google.com/js/plusone.js">
  { lang: 'pt-BR' }
</script>
<g:plusone size="medium"></g:plusone>
</div>
<span style="clear:both; display:block; height:10px;"></span>
<div id="curtir" style="margin-bottom: 20px;">
<iframe scrolling="no" frameborder="0" src="//www.facebook.com/plugins/like.php?href=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2Fufmgbr&amp;send=false&amp;layout=button_count&amp;locale=pt_BR&amp;width=120&amp;show_faces=false&amp;action=like&amp;colorscheme=light&amp;font=tahoma&amp;height=25" style="border: medium none; overflow: hidden; height: 25px; width: 120px; top: -77px;" allowtransparency="true"></iframe>
</div>
<span id="clear" class="clear" style="display:block;"></span>

      <p><span class="texto"><p>A partir de hoje, e até o dia 2 de janeiro, quem acessar o site da UFMG poderá ver uma rápida revoada de garças, anunciando o novo ano para o público. A ave, que é a mascote do projeto <a href="https://www.facebook.com/bocadosdegentileza">Bocados de Gentileza</a>, promovido pela Universidade, já está em andança pelo site desde o dia 17, porém só foi vista por quem acionou um código pelo teclado do computador. </p>

<p>A partir de hoje, o voo é livre. Após  entrar no site, as aves aparecem e poderão ressurgir para o mesmo usuário outras nove vezes ao dia, sempre que ele iniciar o percurso pela homepage. Após o dia 2 de janeiro, as garças só serão acionadas por um código usado em um antigo game.</p>

<p>Conhecida como easter egg, espécie de segredo virtual que desenvolvedores inserem nos códigos de programas, a brincadeira foi o modo escolhido pelos organizadores do projeto de integrar a comunidade de modo divertido, neste final de ano, em vez de divulgar mensagens tradicionais de felicitações.</p>

<p>A ação produziu impacto. Apenas nos três primeiros dias, mais de 20 mil pessoas já haviam teclado o código e acabaram por disseminar, nas redes sociais, a novidade trazida pela Universidade: um conjunto de nove garças mascotes, representando um curso de cada uma das oito áreas do conhecimento, lideradas por outra, que porta o anúncio "2014".</p>

<p><strong>Quem fez</strong><br />
O easter egg foi desenvolvido pela equipe do projeto UFMG Digital do Centro de Comunicação da instituição. Atualmente, o grupo está dando os primeiros passos na produção do novo site da Universidade. Além de estruturar suportes mais avançados de comunicação, o projeto pretende propor experiências originais, no ambiente virtual, para o público da Universidade.</p>

<p>O projeto Bocados de Gentileza é responsável por uma série de ações na UFMG, destinadas a elevar a qualidade do relacionamento entre a comunidade, incentivando mudança de hábitos. As atividades abrangem a promoção de Piquenique no Campus e interferências sobre meio ambiente e trânsito, entre outros temas. As ações possuem como mascote a garça Graciosa, inspirada na ave que sempre circulava pelo campus Pampulha.</p>

<p>Para aderir ao projeto, basta acompanhar o grupo no Facebook (<a href="https://www.facebook.com/bocadosdegentileza">https://www.facebook.com/bocadosdegentileza</a>)</p></span></p>
      </MTEntry>
  </div>
</div>

		<h1 class="fonte2">TV Pajuçara</h1>
		<!--<p class="fonte2">A TV Pajuçara é referência em inovação quando o assunto é conteúdo televisivo em Alagoas. Do jeito da nossa gente, ousamos todos os dias para fazer uma televisão plural, divertida e inteligente. É a TV aberta que mais produz conteúdo local com qualidade, relevância e credibilidade. Presente em quase 100% do território alagoano e contando com a Unidade Agreste Sertão, em Arapiraca, afirma o seu regionalismo e fortalece o seu compromisso com a sociedade. É desse jeito que, há mais de 20 anos, a TV Pajuçara busca estar na sua vida pra valer.</p>-->

							<a href="#" class="fonte2 flutua-esquerda"><span class="hora">22:15 / </span>Gugu</a>
							<div class="class fonte2 flutua-direita">passou</div>
						</div>
					
							</div><!--fim itens-->
		
		</div><!--fim scroll-->
	</div>
		
			</div><!--fim bg-listra-->
		</div>
		<!--/main-->
		<div class="clear"></div>
		<!--footer-->
		<div id="footer"> 
			<div class="menuNav-rodape">

		<address>

    var nav = $('.nav-container');
    
    $(window).scroll(function () {
        if ($(this).scrollTop() > 136) {
            nav.addClass("f-nav");

							<a href="turismoemercado.cfm?id=2118" class=atit2>Vai viajar pro exterior? Conheça as expressões básicas em inglês para momentos de emergência</a><br><br>

									<a href="https://twitter.com/share" class="twitter-share-button" data-count="vertical">Tweet</a>
									<script>!function(d,s,id){var js,fjs=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],p=/^http:/.test(d.location)?'http':'https';if(!d.getElementById(id)){js=d.createElement(s);js.id=id;js.src=p+'://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js';fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js,fjs);}}(document, 'script', 'twitter-wjs');</script>
									<a href="whatsapp://send" data-text=" Vai viajar pro exterior? Conheça as expressões básicas em inglês para momentos de emergência " data-href="http://www.turismo-sa.com/turismoemercado.cfm?id=2118" class="wa_btn wa_btn_s" style="display:none">WhatsApp</a>
							<font class=texto>
							<br><br>
							<b>Vai viajar pro exterior? Conhe&ccedil;a as express&otilde;es b&aacute;sicas em ingl&ecirc;s para momentos de emerg&ecirc;ncia</b> <br />
<br />
<img src="http://www.turismo-sa.com/imagens/SevenIdiomas.jpg" border="1" alt="   " title=" " vspace="3" /> <br />
<br />
Aquela t&atilde;o sonhada f&eacute;rias no exterior est&aacute; cada dia mais perto mas, de repente, bate aquele frio na barriga e uma pequena inseguran&ccedil;a com o ingl&ecirc;s. Ser&aacute; que voc&ecirc; d&aacute; conta do recado? Voc&ecirc; consegue &ldquo;se virar&rdquo; em situa&ccedil;&otilde;es de emerg&ecirc;ncia, por exemplo? Viagem &eacute; aventura e voc&ecirc; precisa estar preparado at&eacute; para alguns eventuais problemas que possam acontecer, afinal, o importante &eacute; aproveitar o passeio e voltar inteiro pra casa. <br />
<br />
Abaixo algumas dicas de ingl&ecirc;s assinadas pelo professor Vin&iacute;cius Tavares, da Seven Idiomas, para situa&ccedil;&otilde;es de emerg&ecirc;ncia. Afinal, <em>you&rsquo;ll have to get by on your own!*</em> <br />
<br />
* <i>Voc&ecirc; vai ter que se virar!</i> <br />
<br />
<b>Palavras m&aacute;gicas!</b> <br />
<br />
&Eacute; interessante ver que, apesar de n&atilde;o nos importarmos muito com &ldquo;etiqueta&rdquo; ao usarmos o portugu&ecirc;s, no ingl&ecirc;s &eacute; justamente ao contr&aacute;rio! Por isso, devemos sempre lembrar de sermos muito educados e sempre usarmos as quatro express&otilde;es que chamamos de &ldquo;palavras m&aacute;gicas&rdquo; quando falarmos com estrangeiros: <b><i>Please</i></b> (por favor); <b><i>You&rsquo;re welcome</i></b>(de nada); <b><i>Thank you</i></b> (obrigado/a); e <b><i>Excuse me</i></b> (me desculpe/com licen&ccedil;a). <br />
<br />
<b>Frases b&aacute;sicas em uma emerg&ecirc;ncia em caso de assaltos ou roubos:</b> <br />
<br />
<i>Please, help me / I need help</i><br />
Por favor, me ajude / preciso de ajuda <br />
<br />
<i>I&rsquo;m in trouble</i><br />
Estou com um problema <br />
<br />
<i>I&rsquo;ve been mugged</i> <br />
<br />
Fui assaltado <br />
<br />
<i>My wallet was stolen/ Someone snatched my purse on a street / I lost my passport</i><br />
Minha carteira foi roubada / Algu&eacute;m levou minha bolsa na rua / Perdi meu passaporte <br />
<br />
<i>Could you help me to contact my embassy?</i> <br />
<br />
Voc&ecirc; poderia me ajudar a contactar minha embaixada? <br />
<br />
<i>Somebody broke into my car</i><br />
Algu&eacute;m arrombou meu carro <br />
<br />
<i>My credit card got skimmed</i><br />
Meu cart&atilde;o de cr&eacute;dito foi clonado <br />
<br />
<i>Can you call the police, please?</i><br />
Voc&ecirc; pode chamar a pol&iacute;cia, por favor? <br />
<br />
<b>Acidente!</b> <br />
<br />
Um r&aacute;pido atendimento &eacute; crucial em caso de acidentes, caso aconte&ccedil;am com voc&ecirc; ou com qualquer outra pessoa. Neste caso, saber se comunicar para pedir ajuda &eacute; muito importante. Esteja preparado! <br />
<br />
<i>Please, call an ambulance</i> <br />
<br />
Por favor, chame uma ambul&acirc;ncia <br />
<br />
<i>I need a doctor</i> <br />
<br />
Preciso de um m&eacute;dico <br />
<br />
<i>There&rsquo;s been an accident</i> <br />
<br />
Houve um acidente <br />
<br />
<i>I had an accident</i><br />
Eu sofri um acidente <br />
<br />
<i>I ran the car into a lamp post</i><br />
Eu bati o carro em um poste de luz <br />
<br />
<i>I was hit by a car</i><br />
Fui atropelado <br />
<br />
<i>I fell down and got injured</i><br />
Eu ca&iacute; e me machuquei <br />
<br />
<i>Someone is drowning</i><br />
Algu&eacute;m est&aacute; se afogando <br />
<br />
<i>Are you in trouble?</i><br />
Voc&ecirc; est&aacute; com algum problema? <br />
<br />
<i>Should I call the police?</i><br />
Eu deveria chamar a pol&iacute;cia? <br />
<br />
<i>Are you ok?</i><br />
Voc&ecirc; est&aacute; bem? <br />
<br />
Please, calm down / I&rsquo;ll ask for help <br />
<br />
Por favor, fique calmo / Vou pedir ajuda <br />
<br />
<b>N&atilde;o &eacute; assalto e nem uma grande emerg&ecirc;ncia, mas &eacute; uma situa&ccedil;&atilde;o imprevis&iacute;vel e voc&ecirc; precisa de ajuda?</b> <br />
<br />
<i>I&rsquo;ve locked myself out of my car/room</i> <br />
<br />
Deixei as chaves dentro do meu carro/quarto <br />
<br />
<i>I&rsquo;ve lost my camera</i> <br />
<br />
Perdi minha c&acirc;mera <br />
<br />
<i>I&rsquo;m lost. Could you tell me how to get to the nearest subway station?</i> <br />
<br />
Estou perdido. Pode me dizer como chegar ao metr&ocirc; mais pr&oacute;ximo? <br />
<br />
<b>Fonte:</b> <strong>Seven Idiomas</strong>
							<br><br>
							<b>Postado por</b> <i>Angela Karam</i> - 28/03/2017 às 14:25

		<script>
			$(function() {
				var $elem = $('#content');
				
				$('#nav_up').fadeIn('slow');
				$('#nav_down').fadeIn('slow');  
				
				$(window).bind('scrollstart', function(){
					$('#nav_up,#nav_down').stop().animate({'opacity':'0.2'});
				});
				$(window).bind('scrollstop', function(){
					$('#nav_up,#nav_down').stop().animate({'opacity':'1'});
				});
				
				$('#nav_down').click(
					function (e) {
						$('html, body').animate({scrollTop: $elem.height()}, 800);
					}
				);
				$('#nav_up').click(
					function (e) {
						$('html, body').animate({scrollTop: '0px'}, 800);
					}
				);
            });
        </script>

Inscrição é uma lata de leite em pó que será doada a entidades carentes. </p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="2"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/ro/rondonia/noticia/motorista-e-preso-com-arma-restrita-em-estacionamento-de-banco-em-ro.ghtml" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/ZynzJjjHiaVFKja0-oeO1RPnCPM=/540x304/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/07/21/img_0884.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/HSm84uYtgbywsCu1IUqhKLeJUqU=/810x456/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/07/21/img_0884.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/NJZ7Inu3n5Iee1Kn9J9YkVT_D4Y=/1080x608/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/07/21/img_0884.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/ZynzJjjHiaVFKja0-oeO1RPnCPM=/540x304/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/07/21/img_0884.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Rondônia</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 2 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/ro/rondonia/noticia/motorista-e-preso-com-arma-restrita-em-estacionamento-de-banco-em-ro.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Motorista é preso com arma restrita em estacionamento de banco em RO</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Suspeito apontou arma dentro do estacionamento em Porto Velho. class="feed-post-body-resumo">Exame tem como finalidade identificar as dificuldades dos estudantes.
Testes são aplicados com turmas dos 5º e do 9º ano.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="load-more gui-color-primary-bg"><a href="/brasil/index/feed/pagina-2.html">Veja mais</a></div><!--!--></div></div></div></div><link id="bstn-external-style" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" data-href="https://s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_51034a7b511149ff823d11cbcd04b2b7/bastian/build/bastian.css"><script>'use strict';(function(b,c,d,e,f,g){function h(){Bastian({"items":[{"age":3448,"content":{"chapeu":{"label":"Rondônia","url":"http://g1.globo.com/ro/rondonia/"},"image":{"cropOptions":{},"sizes":{"L":{"height":608,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/rZr6ZrJOjW_u_4eKQOqJPTjHqmw=/1080x608/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/01/computador1.jpg","width":1080},"M":{"height":456,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/5GFagjSkW0By-Nhw4fjz6Kc7zW0=/810x456/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/01/computador1.jpg","width":810},"S":{"height":304,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/DMiOAXWQA39yx4I6-4XzYrG1GDY=/540x304/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/01/computador1.jpg","width":540},"V":{"height":620,"url":"http://s2.glbimg.com/kEPzVfYZ095nXGJC6HpeieslNSA=/570x620/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/01/computador1.jpg","width":570}},"url":"http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/01/computador1.jpg"},"summary":"Ao todo 11 tipos de cursos estão sendo oferecidos. class="widget_rodape_container"><div class="diretorio-wrapper footer product-color" data-ga-area="diretorio"><div class="grid-12 clearfix row"><div class="column diretorio-content"><a class="logo-area data-ga-marker="links"><div class="column"><ul class="first-line"><li class="ib middle"><a class="logo" href="//globo.com/" title="Globo.com">Globo.com</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a conosco</a></li></ul></div></div></div></div></footer></div><script type="text/javascript">var glb_realtime_map={site:'gshow',categories:['agreador','gshow'],url:'http://gshow.globo.com/Musica/'};$.getScript("http://s.glbimg.com/bu/rt/js/glb-rt-min.js",function(){$.ajax({dataType:'jsonp',url:"http://s.glbimg.com/et/gs/static/2015/home/js/realtime-map-agregador.js",jsonpCallback:'glbrealtime_callback',success:function(json){$.glbrealtime({data:json});}});});</script><script type="text/javascript">;(function($){var plugin={};var defaults={mode:'horizontal',slideSelector:'',infiniteLoop:true,hideControlOnEnd:false,speed:200,easing:null,slideMargin:0,startSlide:0,randomStart:false,captions:false,ticker:false,tickerHover:false,adaptiveHeight:false,adaptiveHeightSpeed:500,video:false,useCSS:true,preloadImages:'hidden',responsive:true,slideZIndex:50,wrapperClass:'gui-carousel',touchEnabled:true,swipeThreshold:50,oneToOneTouch:true,preventDefaultSwipeX:true,preventDefaultSwipeY:false,pager:true,pagerType:'full',pagerShortSeparator:' / ',pagerSelector:null,buildPager:null,pagerCustom:null,controls:true,nextText:'Next',prevText:'Prev',nextSelector:null,prevSelector:null,autoControls:false,startText:'Start',stopText:'Stop',autoControlsCombine:false,autoControlsSelector:null,auto:false,pause:4000,autoStart:true,autoDirection:'next',autoHover:false,autoDelay:0,autoSlideForOnePage:false,minSlides:1,maxSlides:1,moveSlides:0,slideWidth:0,onSliderLoad:function(){},onSlideBefore:function(){},onSlideAfter:function(){},onSlideNext:function(){},onSlidePrev:function(){},onSliderResize:function(){}}
$.fn.bxSlider=function(options){if(this.length==0)return this;if(this.length>1){this.each(function(){$(this).bxSlider(options)});return this;}
var slider={};var el=this;plugin.el=this;var windowWidth=$(window).width();var windowHeight=$(window).height();var init=function(){slider.settings=$.extend({},defaults,options);slider.settings.slideWidth=parseInt(slider.settings.slideWidth);slider.children=el.children(slider.settings.slideSelector);if(slider.children.length<slider.settings.minSlides)slider.settings.minSlides=slider.children.length;if(slider.children.length<slider.settings.maxSlides)slider.settings.maxSlides=slider.children.length;if(slider.settings.randomStart)slider.settings.startSlide=Math.floor(Math.random()*slider.children.length);slider.active={index:slider.settings.startSlide}
slider.carousel=slider.settings.minSlides>1||slider.settings.maxSlides>1;if(slider.carousel)slider.settings.preloadImages='all';slider.minThreshold=(slider.settings.minSlides*slider.settings.slideWidth)+((slider.settings.minSlides-1)*slider.settings.slideMargin);slider.maxThreshold=(slider.settings.maxSlides*slider.settings.slideWidth)+((slider.settings.maxSlides-1)*slider.settings.slideMargin);slider.working=false;slider.controls={};slider.interval=null;slider.animProp=slider.settings.mode=='vertical'?'top':'left';slider.usingCSS=slider.settings.useCSS&&slider.settings.mode!='fade'&&(function(){var div=document.createElement('div');var props=['WebkitPerspective','MozPerspective','OPerspective','msPerspective'];for(var i in props){if(div.style[props[i]]!==undefined){slider.cssPrefix=props[i].replace('Perspective','').toLowerCase();slider.animProp='-'+slider.cssPrefix+'-transform';return true;}}
return false;}());if(slider.settings.mode=='vertical')slider.settings.maxSlides=slider.settings.minSlides;el.data("origStyle",el.attr("style"));el.children(slider.settings.slideSelector).each(function(){$(this).data("origStyle",$(this).attr("style"));});setup();}
var setup=function(){el.wrap('<div class="'+slider.settings.wrapperClass+'"><div class="gui-carousel-component-element"></div></div>');slider.viewport=el.parent();slider.loader=$('<div class="bx-loading" />');slider.viewport.prepend(slider.loader);el.css({width:slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'?(slider.children.length*100+215)+'%':'auto',position:'relative'});if(slider.usingCSS&&slider.settings.easing){el.css('-'+slider.cssPrefix+'-transition-timing-function',slider.settings.easing);}else if(!slider.settings.easing){slider.settings.easing='swing';}
var slidesShowing=getNumberSlidesShowing();slider.viewport.css({width:'100%',overflow:'hidden',position:'relative'});slider.viewport.parent().css({maxWidth:getViewportMaxWidth()});if(!slider.settings.pager){slider.viewport.parent().css({margin:'0 auto 0px'});}
slider.children.css({'float':slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'?'left':'none',listStyle:'none',position:'relative'});slider.children.css('width',getSlideWidth());if(slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'&&slider.settings.slideMargin>0)slider.children.css('marginRight',slider.settings.slideMargin);if(slider.settings.mode=='vertical'&&slider.settings.slideMargin>0)slider.children.css('marginBottom',slider.settings.slideMargin);if(slider.settings.mode=='fade'){slider.children.css({position:'absolute',zIndex:0,display:'none'});slider.children.eq(slider.settings.startSlide).css({zIndex:slider.settings.slideZIndex,display:'block'});}
slider.controls.el=$('<div class="bx-controls" />');if(slider.settings.captions)appendCaptions();slider.active.last=slider.settings.startSlide==getPagerQty()-1;if(slider.settings.video)el.fitVids();var preloadSelector=slider.children.eq(slider.settings.startSlide);if(slider.settings.preloadImages=="all")preloadSelector=slider.children;if(!slider.settings.ticker){if(slider.settings.pager)appendPager();if(slider.settings.controls)appendControls();if(slider.settings.auto&&slider.settings.autoControls)appendControlsAuto();if(slider.settings.controls||slider.settings.autoControls||slider.settings.pager)slider.viewport.after(slider.controls.el);}else{slider.settings.pager=false;}
loadElements(preloadSelector,start);}
var loadElements=function(selector,callback){var total=selector.find('img, iframe').length;if(total==0){callback();return;}
var count=0;selector.find('img, iframe').each(function(){$(this).one('load',function(){if(++count==total)callback();}).each(function(){if(this.complete)$(this).load();});});}
var start=function(){if(slider.settings.infiniteLoop&&slider.settings.mode!='fade'&&!slider.settings.ticker){var slice=slider.settings.mode=='vertical'?slider.settings.minSlides:slider.settings.maxSlides;var sliceAppend=slider.children.slice(0,slice).clone().addClass('bx-clone');var slicePrepend=slider.children.slice(-slice).clone().addClass('bx-clone');el.append(sliceAppend).prepend(slicePrepend);}
slider.loader.remove();setSlidePosition();if(slider.settings.mode=='vertical')slider.settings.adaptiveHeight=true;slider.viewport.height(getViewportHeight());el.redrawSlider();slider.settings.onSliderLoad(slider.active.index);slider.initialized=true;if(slider.settings.responsive)$(window).bind('resize',resizeWindow);if(slider.settings.auto&&slider.settings.autoStart&&(getPagerQty()>1||slider.settings.autoSlideForOnePage))initAuto();if(slider.settings.ticker)initTicker();if(slider.settings.pager)updatePagerActive(slider.settings.startSlide);if(slider.settings.controls)updateDirectionControls();if(slider.settings.touchEnabled&&!slider.settings.ticker)initTouch();}
var getViewportHeight=function(){var height=0;var children=$();if(slider.settings.mode!='vertical'&&!slider.settings.adaptiveHeight){children=slider.children;}else{if(!slider.carousel){children=slider.children.eq(slider.active.index);}else{var currentIndex=slider.settings.moveSlides==1?slider.active.index:slider.active.index*getMoveBy();children=slider.children.eq(currentIndex);for(i=1;i<=slider.settings.maxSlides-1;i++){if(currentIndex+i>=slider.children.length){children=children.add(slider.children.eq(i-1));}else{children=children.add(slider.children.eq(currentIndex+i));}}}}
if(slider.settings.mode=='vertical'){children.each(function(index){height+=$(this).outerHeight();});if(slider.settings.slideMargin>0){height+=slider.settings.slideMargin*(slider.settings.minSlides-1);}}else{height=Math.max.apply(Math,children.map(function(){return $(this).outerHeight(false);}).get());}
if(slider.viewport.css('box-sizing')=='border-box'){height+=parseFloat(slider.viewport.css('padding-top'))+parseFloat(slider.viewport.css('padding-bottom'))+
parseFloat(slider.viewport.css('border-top-width'))+parseFloat(slider.viewport.css('border-bottom-width'));}else if(slider.viewport.css('box-sizing')=='padding-box'){height+=parseFloat(slider.viewport.css('padding-top'))+parseFloat(slider.viewport.css('padding-bottom'));}
return height;}
var getViewportMaxWidth=function(){var width='100%';if(slider.settings.slideWidth>0){if(slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'){width=(slider.settings.maxSlides*slider.settings.slideWidth)+((slider.settings.maxSlides-1)*slider.settings.slideMargin);}else{width=slider.settings.slideWidth;}}
return width;}
var getSlideWidth=function(){var newElWidth=slider.settings.slideWidth;var wrapWidth=slider.viewport.width();if(slider.settings.slideWidth==0||(slider.settings.slideWidth>wrapWidth&&!slider.carousel)||slider.settings.mode=='vertical'){newElWidth=wrapWidth;}else if(slider.settings.maxSlides>1&&slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'){if(wrapWidth>slider.maxThreshold){}else if(wrapWidth<slider.minThreshold){newElWidth=(wrapWidth-(slider.settings.slideMargin*(slider.settings.minSlides-1)))/slider.settings.minSlides;}}
return newElWidth;}
var getNumberSlidesShowing=function(){var slidesShowing=1;if(slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'&&slider.settings.slideWidth>0){if(slider.viewport.width()<slider.minThreshold){slidesShowing=slider.settings.minSlides;}else if(slider.viewport.width()>slider.maxThreshold){slidesShowing=slider.settings.maxSlides;}else{var childWidth=slider.children.first().width()+slider.settings.slideMargin;slidesShowing=Math.floor((slider.viewport.width()+
slider.settings.slideMargin)/childWidth);}}else if(slider.settings.mode=='vertical'){slidesShowing=slider.settings.minSlides;}
return slidesShowing;}
var getPagerQty=function(){var pagerQty=0;if(slider.settings.moveSlides>0){if(slider.settings.infiniteLoop){pagerQty=Math.ceil(slider.children.length/getMoveBy());}else{var breakPoint=0;var counter=0
while(breakPoint<slider.children.length){++pagerQty;breakPoint=counter+getNumberSlidesShowing();counter+=slider.settings.moveSlides<=getNumberSlidesShowing()?slider.settings.moveSlides:getNumberSlidesShowing();}}}else{pagerQty=Math.ceil(slider.children.length/getNumberSlidesShowing());}
return pagerQty;}
var getMoveBy=function(){if(slider.settings.moveSlides>0&&slider.settings.moveSlides<=getNumberSlidesShowing()){return slider.settings.moveSlides;}
return getNumberSlidesShowing();}
var setSlidePosition=function(){if(slider.children.length>slider.settings.maxSlides&&slider.active.last&&!slider.settings.infiniteLoop){if(slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'){var lastChild=slider.children.last();var position=lastChild.position();setPositionProperty(-(position.left-(slider.viewport.width()-lastChild.outerWidth())),'reset',0);}else if(slider.settings.mode=='vertical'){var lastShowingIndex=slider.children.length-slider.settings.minSlides;var position=slider.children.eq(lastShowingIndex).position();setPositionProperty(-position.top,'reset',0);}}else{var position=slider.children.eq(slider.active.index*getMoveBy()).position();if(slider.active.index==getPagerQty()-1)slider.active.last=true;if(position!=undefined){if(slider.settings.mode=='horizontal')setPositionProperty(-position.left,'reset',0);else if(slider.settings.mode=='vertical')setPositionProperty(-position.top,'reset',0);}}}
var setPositionProperty=function(value,type,duration,params){if(slider.usingCSS){var propValue=slider.settings.mode=='vertical'?'translate3d(0, '+value+'px, 0)':'translate3d('+value+'px, 0, 0)';el.css('-'+slider.cssPrefix+'-transition-duration',duration/1000+'s');if(type=='slide'){el.css(slider.animProp,propValue);el.bind('transitionend webkitTransitionEnd oTransitionEnd MSTransitionEnd',function(){el.unbind('transitionend webkitTransitionEnd oTransitionEnd MSTransitionEnd');updateAfterSlideTransition();});}else if(type=='reset'){el.css(slider.animProp,propValue);}else if(type=='ticker'){el.css('-'+slider.cssPrefix+'-transition-timing-function','linear');el.css(slider.animProp,propValue);el.bind('transitionend webkitTransitionEnd oTransitionEnd MSTransitionEnd',function(){el.unbind('transitionend webkitTransitionEnd oTransitionEnd MSTransitionEnd');setPositionProperty(params['resetValue'],'reset',0);tickerLoop();});}}else{var animateObj={};animateObj[slider.animProp]=value;if(type=='slide'){el.animate(animateObj,duration,slider.settings.easing,function(){updateAfterSlideTransition();});}else if(type=='reset'){el.css(slider.animProp,value)}else if(type=='ticker'){el.animate(animateObj,speed,'linear',function(){setPositionProperty(params['resetValue'],'reset',0);tickerLoop();});}}}
var populatePager=function(){var pagerHtml='';var pagerQty=getPagerQty();if(pagerQty>1){for(var i=0;i<pagerQty;i++){var linkContent='';if(slider.settings.buildPager&&$.isFunction(slider.settings.buildPager)){linkContent=slider.settings.buildPager(i);slider.pagerEl.addClass('bx-custom-pager');}else{linkContent=i+1;slider.pagerEl.addClass('gui-pagination-bullets');}
pagerHtml+='<span data-slide-index="'+i+'" class="gui-pagination-bullet gui-pagination-bullet-disable"></span>';};slider.pagerEl.html(pagerHtml);}}
var appendPager=function(){if(!slider.settings.pagerCustom){slider.pagerEl=$('<div class="bx-pager" />');if(slider.settings.pagerSelector){$(slider.settings.pagerSelector).html(slider.pagerEl);}else{slider.controls.el.addClass('bx-has-pager').append(slider.pagerEl);}
populatePager();}else{slider.pagerEl=$(slider.settings.pagerCustom);}
slider.pagerEl.on('click','span',clickPagerBind);}
var appendControls=function(){if(getPagerQty()>1){slider.controls.next=$('<span class="gui-carousel-component-arrow-right gui-icon gui-icon-arrow-right-highlight gui-color-primary"></span>');slider.controls.prev=$('<span class="gui-carousel-component-arrow-left gui-icon gui-icon-arrow-left-highlight gui-color-primary"></span>');slider.controls.next.bind('click',clickNextBind);slider.controls.prev.bind('click',clickPrevBind);if(slider.settings.nextSelector){$(slider.settings.nextSelector).append(slider.controls.next);}
if(slider.settings.prevSelector){$(slider.settings.prevSelector).append(slider.controls.prev);}
if(!slider.settings.nextSelector&&!slider.settings.prevSelector){slider.controls.el.append(slider.controls.prev).append(slider.controls.next);}}}
var appendControlsAuto=function(){slider.controls.start=$('<div class="bx-controls-auto-item"><a class="bx-start" href="">'+slider.settings.startText+'</a></div>');slider.controls.stop=$('<div class="bx-controls-auto-item"><a class="bx-stop" href="">'+slider.settings.stopText+'</a></div>');slider.controls.autoEl=$('<div class="bx-controls-auto" />');slider.controls.autoEl.on('click','.bx-start',clickStartBind);slider.controls.autoEl.on('click','.bx-stop',clickStopBind);if(slider.settings.autoControlsCombine){slider.controls.autoEl.append(slider.controls.start);}else{slider.controls.autoEl.append(slider.controls.start).append(slider.controls.stop);}
if(slider.settings.autoControlsSelector){$(slider.settings.autoControlsSelector).html(slider.controls.autoEl);}else{slider.controls.el.addClass('bx-has-controls-auto').append(slider.controls.autoEl);}
updateAutoControls(slider.settings.autoStart?'stop':'start');}
var appendCaptions=function(){slider.children.each(function(index){var title=$(this).find('img:first').attr('title');if(title!=undefined&&(''+title).length){$(this).append('<div class="bx-caption"><span>'+title+'</span></div>');}});}
var clickNextBind=function(e){if(slider.settings.auto){el.stopAuto();el.startAuto();}
el.goToNextSlide();e.preventDefault();}
var clickPrevBind=function(e){if(slider.settings.auto){el.stopAuto();el.startAuto();}
el.goToPrevSlide();e.preventDefault();}
var clickStartBind=function(e){el.startAuto();e.preventDefault();}
var clickStopBind=function(e){el.stopAuto();e.preventDefault();}
var clickPagerBind=function(e,element){var pagerLink=$(e.currentTarget);if(pagerLink.attr('data-slide-index')!==undefined){el.controlaCoresBullet(pagerLink);var pagerIndex=parseInt(pagerLink.attr('data-slide-index'));if(pagerIndex!=slider.active.index){el.goToSlide(pagerIndex);}
e.preventDefault();}}
var updatePagerActive=function(slideIndex){var len=slider.children.length;if(slider.settings.pagerType=='short'){if(slider.settings.maxSlides>1){len=Math.ceil(slider.children.length/slider.settings.maxSlides);}
slider.pagerEl.html((slideIndex+1)+slider.settings.pagerShortSeparator+len);return;}
el.controlaCoresBullet(slider.pagerEl.find('span').eq(slideIndex));}
var updateAfterSlideTransition=function(){if(slider.settings.infiniteLoop){var position='';if(slider.active.index==0){position=slider.children.eq(0).position();}else if(slider.active.index==getPagerQty()-1&&slider.carousel){position=slider.children.eq((getPagerQty()-1)*getMoveBy()).position();}else if(slider.active.index==slider.children.length-1){position=slider.children.eq(slider.children.length-1).position();}
if(position){if(slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'){setPositionProperty(-position.left,'reset',0);}
else if(slider.settings.mode=='vertical'){setPositionProperty(-position.top,'reset',0);}}}
slider.working=false;slider.settings.onSlideAfter(slider.children.eq(slider.active.index),slider.oldIndex,slider.active.index);}
var updateAutoControls=function(state){if(slider.settings.autoControlsCombine){slider.controls.autoEl.html(slider.controls[state]);}else{slider.controls.autoEl.find('a').removeClass('active');slider.controls.autoEl.find('a:not(.bx-'+state+')').addClass('active');}}
var updateDirectionControls=function(){if(getPagerQty()==1){}else if(!slider.settings.infiniteLoop&&slider.settings.hideControlOnEnd){if(slider.active.index==0){slider.controls.prev.addClass('disabled');slider.controls.next.removeClass('disabled');}else if(slider.active.index==getPagerQty()-1){slider.controls.next.addClass('disabled');slider.controls.prev.removeClass('disabled');}else{slider.controls.prev.removeClass('disabled');slider.controls.next.removeClass('disabled');}}}
var initAuto=function(){if(slider.settings.autoDelay>0){var timeout=setTimeout(el.startAuto,slider.settings.autoDelay);}else{el.startAuto();}
if(slider.settings.autoHover){var father=el.parents(".gui-carousel");var right=father.find('.gui-carousel-component-arrow-right'),left=father.find('.gui-carousel-component-arrow-left'),bullets=father.find('.gui-pagination-bullets');var hoverStop=function(){if(slider.interval){el.stopAuto(true);slider.autoPaused=true;};};var hoverStart=function(){if(slider.autoPaused){el.startAuto(true);slider.autoPaused=null;}};el.hover(hoverStop,hoverStart);right.hover(hoverStop,hoverStart);left.hover(hoverStop,hoverStart);bullets.hover(hoverStop,hoverStart);}}
var initTicker=function(){var startPosition=0;if(slider.settings.autoDirection=='next'){el.append(slider.children.clone().addClass('bx-clone'));}else{el.prepend(slider.children.clone().addClass('bx-clone'));var position=slider.children.first().position();startPosition=slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'?-position.left:-position.top;}
setPositionProperty(startPosition,'reset',0);slider.settings.pager=false;slider.settings.controls=false;slider.settings.autoControls=false;if(slider.settings.tickerHover&&!slider.usingCSS){slider.viewport.hover(function(){el.stop();},function(){var totalDimens=0;slider.children.each(function(index){totalDimens+=slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'?$(this).outerWidth(true):$(this).outerHeight(true);});var ratio=slider.settings.speed/totalDimens;var property=slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'?'left':'top';var newSpeed=ratio*(totalDimens-(Math.abs(parseInt(el.css(property)))));tickerLoop(newSpeed);});}
tickerLoop();}
var tickerLoop=function(resumeSpeed){speed=resumeSpeed?resumeSpeed:slider.settings.speed;var position={left:0,top:0};var reset={left:0,top:0};if(slider.settings.autoDirection=='next'){position=el.find('.bx-clone').first().position();}else{reset=slider.children.first().position();}
var animateProperty=slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'?-position.left:-position.top;var resetValue=slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'?-reset.left:-reset.top;var params={resetValue:resetValue};setPositionProperty(animateProperty,'ticker',speed,params);}
var initTouch=function(){slider.touch={start:{x:0,y:0},end:{x:0,y:0}}
slider.viewport.bind('touchstart MSPointerDown',onTouchStart);}
var onTouchStart=function(e){if(slider.working){e.preventDefault();}else{slider.touch.originalPos=el.position();var orig=e.originalEvent;var touchPoints=(typeof orig.changedTouches!='undefined')?orig.changedTouches:[orig];slider.touch.start.x=touchPoints[0].pageX;slider.touch.start.y=touchPoints[0].pageY;slider.viewport.bind('touchmove MSPointerMove',onTouchMove);slider.viewport.bind('touchend MSPointerOut',onTouchEnd);}}
var onTouchMove=function(e){var orig=e.originalEvent;var touchPoints=(typeof orig.changedTouches!='undefined')?orig.changedTouches:[orig];var xMovement=Math.abs(touchPoints[0].pageX-slider.touch.start.x);var yMovement=Math.abs(touchPoints[0].pageY-slider.touch.start.y);if((xMovement*3)>yMovement&&slider.settings.preventDefaultSwipeX){e.preventDefault();}else if((yMovement*3)>xMovement&&slider.settings.preventDefaultSwipeY){e.preventDefault();}
if(slider.settings.mode!='fade'&&slider.settings.oneToOneTouch){var value=0;if(slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'){var change=touchPoints[0].pageX-slider.touch.start.x;value=slider.touch.originalPos.left+change;}else{var change=touchPoints[0].pageY-slider.touch.start.y;value=slider.touch.originalPos.top+change;}
setPositionProperty(value,'reset',0);}}
var onTouchEnd=function(e){slider.viewport.unbind('touchmove MSPointerMove',onTouchMove);var orig=e.originalEvent;var touchPoints=(typeof orig.changedTouches!='undefined')?orig.changedTouches:[orig];var value=0;slider.touch.end.x=touchPoints[0].pageX;slider.touch.end.y=touchPoints[0].pageY;if(slider.settings.mode=='fade'){var distance=Math.abs(slider.touch.start.x-slider.touch.end.x);if(distance>=slider.settings.swipeThreshold){slider.touch.start.x>slider.touch.end.x?el.goToNextSlide():el.goToPrevSlide();el.stopAuto();}}else{var distance=0;if(slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'){distance=slider.touch.end.x-slider.touch.start.x;value=slider.touch.originalPos.left;}else{distance=slider.touch.end.y-slider.touch.start.y;value=slider.touch.originalPos.top;}
if(!slider.settings.infiniteLoop&&((slider.active.index==0&&distance>0)||(slider.active.last&&distance<0))){setPositionProperty(value,'reset',200);}else{if(Math.abs(distance)>=slider.settings.swipeThreshold){distance<0?el.goToNextSlide():el.goToPrevSlide();el.stopAuto();}else{setPositionProperty(value,'reset',200);}}}
slider.viewport.unbind('touchend MSPointerOut',onTouchEnd);}
var resizeWindow=function(e){if(!slider.initialized)return;var windowWidthNew=$(window).width();var windowHeightNew=$(window).height();if(windowWidth!=windowWidthNew||windowHeight!=windowHeightNew){windowWidth=windowWidthNew;windowHeight=windowHeightNew;window.setTimeout(function(){el.redrawSlider();slider.settings.onSliderResize.call(el,slider.active.index);},100);}}
el.goToSlide=function(slideIndex,direction){if(slider.working||slider.active.index==slideIndex)return;slider.working=true;slider.oldIndex=slider.active.index;if(slideIndex<0){slider.active.index=getPagerQty()-1;}else if(slideIndex>=getPagerQty()){slider.active.index=0;}else{slider.active.index=slideIndex;}
slider.settings.onSlideBefore(slider.children.eq(slider.active.index),slider.oldIndex,slider.active.index);if(direction=='next'){slider.settings.onSlideNext(slider.children.eq(slider.active.index),slider.oldIndex,slider.active.index);}else if(direction=='prev'){slider.settings.onSlidePrev(slider.children.eq(slider.active.index),slider.oldIndex,slider.active.index);}
slider.active.last=slider.active.index>=getPagerQty()-1;if(slider.settings.pager)updatePagerActive(slider.active.index);if(slider.settings.controls)updateDirectionControls();if(slider.settings.mode=='fade'){if(slider.settings.adaptiveHeight&&slider.viewport.height()!=getViewportHeight()){slider.viewport.animate({height:getViewportHeight()},slider.settings.adaptiveHeightSpeed);}
slider.children.filter(':visible').fadeOut(slider.settings.speed).css({zIndex:0});slider.children.eq(slider.active.index).css('zIndex',slider.settings.slideZIndex+1).fadeIn(slider.settings.speed,function(){$(this).css('zIndex',slider.settings.slideZIndex);updateAfterSlideTransition();});}else{if(slider.settings.adaptiveHeight&&slider.viewport.height()!=getViewportHeight()){slider.viewport.animate({height:getViewportHeight()},slider.settings.adaptiveHeightSpeed);}
var moveBy=0;var position={left:0,top:0};if(!slider.settings.infiniteLoop&&slider.carousel&&slider.active.last){if(slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'){var lastChild=slider.children.eq(slider.children.length-1);position=lastChild.position();moveBy=slider.viewport.width()-lastChild.outerWidth();}else{var lastShowingIndex=slider.children.length-slider.settings.minSlides;position=slider.children.eq(lastShowingIndex).position();}}else if(slider.carousel&&slider.active.last&&direction=='prev'){var eq=slider.settings.moveSlides==1?slider.settings.maxSlides-getMoveBy():((getPagerQty()-1)*getMoveBy())-(slider.children.length-slider.settings.maxSlides);var lastChild=el.children('.bx-clone').eq(eq);position=lastChild.position();}else if(direction=='next'&&slider.active.index==0){position=el.find('> .bx-clone').eq(slider.settings.maxSlides).position();slider.active.last=false;}else if(slideIndex>=0){var requestEl=slideIndex*getMoveBy();position=slider.children.eq(requestEl).position();}
if("undefined"!==typeof(position)){var value=slider.settings.mode=='horizontal'?-(position.left-moveBy):-position.top;setPositionProperty(value,'slide',slider.settings.speed);}}}
el.goToNextSlide=function(){if(!slider.settings.infiniteLoop&&slider.active.last)return;var pagerIndex=parseInt(slider.active.index)+1;el.goToSlide(pagerIndex,'next');}
el.goToPrevSlide=function(){if(!slider.settings.infiniteLoop&&slider.active.index==0)return;var pagerIndex=parseInt(slider.active.index)-1;el.goToSlide(pagerIndex,'prev');}
el.startAuto=function(preventControlUpdate){if(slider.interval)return;slider.interval=setInterval(function(){slider.settings.autoDirection=='next'?el.goToNextSlide():el.goToPrevSlide();},slider.settings.pause);if(slider.settings.autoControls&&preventControlUpdate!=true)updateAutoControls('stop');}
el.stopAuto=function(preventControlUpdate){if(!slider.interval)return;clearInterval(slider.interval);slider.interval=null;if(slider.settings.autoControls&&preventControlUpdate!=true)updateAutoControls('start');}
el.getCurrentSlide=function(){return slider.active.index;}
el.getCurrentSlideElement=function(){return slider.children.eq(slider.active.index);}
el.getSlideCount=function(){return slider.children.length;}
el.redrawSlider=function(){slider.children.add(el.find('.bx-clone')).width(getSlideWidth());slider.viewport.css('height',getViewportHeight());if(!slider.settings.ticker)setSlidePosition();if(slider.active.last)slider.active.index=getPagerQty()-1;if(slider.active.index>=getPagerQty())slider.active.last=true;if(slider.settings.pager&&!slider.settings.pagerCustom){populatePager();updatePagerActive(slider.active.index);}}
el.destroySlider=function(){if(!slider.initialized)return;slider.initialized=false;$('.bx-clone',this).remove();slider.children.each(function(){$(this).data("origStyle")!=undefined?$(this).attr("style",$(this).data("origStyle")):$(this).removeAttr('style');});$(this).data("origStyle")!=undefined?this.attr("style",$(this).data("origStyle")):$(this).removeAttr('style');$(this).unwrap().unwrap();if(slider.controls.el)slider.controls.el.remove();if(slider.controls.next)slider.controls.next.remove();if(slider.controls.prev)slider.controls.prev.remove();if(slider.pagerEl&&slider.settings.controls)slider.pagerEl.remove();$('.bx-caption',this).remove();if(slider.controls.autoEl)slider.controls.autoEl.remove();clearInterval(slider.interval);if(slider.settings.responsive)$(window).unbind('resize',resizeWindow);}
el.reloadSlider=function(settings){if(settings!=undefined)options=settings;el.destroySlider();init();}
el.controlaCoresBullet=function(elemento){var irmaos=elemento.siblings();irmaos.removeClass('gui-color-primary');irmaos.addClass('gui-pagination-bullet-disable');elemento.removeClass('gui-pagination-bullet-disable');elemento.addClass('gui-color-primary');}

(function($){'use strict';WidgetNewsfeed.prototype={init:function init(selector,options){this.options=options;this.$root=$(selector);this.$newsfeedFilters=this.$root.find('.gui-navigation-filter');this.$newsfeedList=this.$root.find('.gui-newsfeed-list');this.$newsfeedLoading=this.$root.find('.gui-loading-spinner');this.$newsfeedMoreUrl=this.$root.find('.gui-link-more');this.$newsfeedCurrentFilter=this.$newsfeedFilters.find('li.gui-navigation-filter-item-selected');this.selectedStyle=this.$newsfeedCurrentFilter.attr('class');this.normalStyle=this.$newsfeedFilters.find('li:not(.gui-navigation-filter-item-selected):first').attr('class');this.bindClick();},bindClick:function bindClick(){var self=this;this.$newsfeedFilters.on('click','li:not(.gui-navigation-filter-item-selected)',function(event){self.$newsfeedList.hide();self.$newsfeedMoreUrl.hide();self.$newsfeedLoading.show();if(window._gaq!==undefined){window._gaq.push(['_trackEvent','Feed','Navegacao','Feed 1 - '+(self.$newsfeedFilters.find('li').index(this)+1),0,true]);}
self.$newsfeedCurrentFilter.removeClass(self.selectedStyle).addClass(self.normalStyle);$(this).removeClass(self.normalStyle).addClass(self.selectedStyle);self.$newsfeedCurrentFilter=$(this);self.getContent();event.preventDefault();event.stopPostopPropagation();});},getContent:function getContent(){var jsonURL=this.$newsfeedCurrentFilter.attr('data-query');var self=this;$.ajax({url:jsonURL,dataType:'html',type:'GET',cache:true,success:function(data){self.$newsfeedList.html(data);self.$newsfeedMoreUrl.text('veja tudo de '+self.$newsfeedCurrentFilter.attr('data-name')).attr('href',self.$newsfeedCurrentFilter.attr('data-more-url'));self.$newsfeedList.fadeIn();self.$newsfeedMoreUrl.fadeIn();self.$newsfeedLoading.hide();}});}};}(jQuery));$(window).load(function(){new WidgetNewsfeed('#gui-newsfeed-widget-with-filters');});</script><script type="text/javascript" src="http://s.glbimg.com/et/gs/static/2015/CACHE/js/13789ef99990.js"></script><link rel="stylesheet"
                  media="screen"

                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script></script><style>

    <dl class="portalMessage info" id="kssPortalMessage" style="display:none">
        <dt>Info</dt>

			<article>
				
				<div id="content">
					
				


<div style="font-size:14px; text-align: left">
  
  <p style="padding: 10px 10px 7px 10px;	margin-bottom: 10px; 
font-weight: bold;	font-size: 16pt;">The Free Software Foundation 
(FSF) is a nonprofit with a worldwide mission to promote computer user 
freedom. We defend the rights of all software users. <a href="https://www.fsf.org/about/"><span style="text-decoration:underline">Read more.</span></a>
  </p>
  
 <div style="background-color: #ecf0f1; text-align: center; 
margin-bottom: 15px; font-size: 14pt;"><p><b>We are hiring!</b> See our listings for a <a href="/resources/jobs/fsf-job-opportunity-campaigns-manager-2017">Campaigns Manager </a> and <a href="resources/jobs/fsf-job-opportunity-outreach-communications-coordinator">Outreach & Communications Coordinator</a>.</p>
 </div>

  <div style="float: left; width: 50%;">    

<a href="https://media.libreplanet.org/u/libreplanet/m/free-software-stories-from-fsf30-640-webm">


<img src="//static.fsf.org/fsforg/fsf-story-poster.png" alt="We asked 
members of the free software community to share their stories." style="width: 100%">
</a>

<p></p> 


<p><strong>Story connects us to what we do. At the 
Free Software Foundation's 30th anniversary,
we asked folks in the community to share their stories. <a href="https://www.fsf.org/blogs/community/what-is-your-free-software-story">What


 is your free software story?</a></strong></p> 



</div> 


      <div style="margin-left: 530px">
        <p style="float: left;">Free software developers guarantee
 everyone equal rights to their programs; any user can study the source 
code, modify it, and share the program. By contrast, most software 
carries fine print that denies users these basic rights, leaving them 
susceptible to the whims of its owners and vulnerable to 
surveillance.</p>
        
        <ul style="float: left;">
          <li>The FSF provides critical infrastructure and funding
 for the <a href="https://gnu.org">GNU project</a>, the 
foundation of the popular GNU/Linux family of free operating systems and
 the keystone of the Internet.</li>
          <li>Our <a href="https://www.fsf.org/campaigns">Campaigns Team</a> creates
 educational materials about free software, convenes the yearly <a href="https://libreplanet.org/conference">LibrePlanet 
conference</a> and goes toe to toe against powerful interests that
 threaten computer user rights.</li>
          <li>Our <a href="https://www.fsf.org/licensing">Licensing & Compliance 
Lab</a> defends freely licensed software from proprietary 
hoarding, advises on licensing issues, and certifies devices that <a href="https://www.fsf.org/ryf">Respect Your 
Freedom</a>.</li>
        </ul>
        <p style="float: left;"><strong>With your support, 
we've done these things for 30 years. Help launch us into 30 more; <a href="https://fsf.org/jfb">please become a member 
today</a>.</strong></p>
      </div>
      
      <div class="search-container">  
        <div class="search-box">
          <p class="search-description">
            Subscribe to our monthly newsletter, the <a href="https://www.fsf.org/free-software-supporter/">Free Software 
Supporter</a>:
          </p>
          <form action="https://my.fsf.org/civicrm/profile/create?reset=1&amp;gid=31" method="post">
          <input type="text" placeholder="Email address" name="email-Primary" size="25" maxlength="80" />
          <input class="action-button" type="submit" value="Sign up" name="_qf_Edit_next">
          <input name="postURL" type="hidden" value="" />
          <input type="hidden" name="group[25]" value="1" />
          <input name="cancelURL" type="hidden" value="https://my.fsf.org/civicrm/profile?reset=1&amp;gid=31" />
          <input name="_qf_default" type="hidden" value="Edit:cancel" />
        </form>
      </div>
      
      <div class="search-box">
        <p class="search-description">
          Search the FSF's Web site:
        </p>
        <form id="sidesearch" name="searchform" action="/search">
          <input name="SearchableText" type="text" size="25" title="Search Site" />
          <input class="action-button" type="submit" value="Search" />
        </form>
      </div>
      
      <div class="search-box">
        <p class="search-description">
          Looking for free software?
        </p>
        <form action="https://directory.fsf.org/wiki">
          <input autocomplete="off" name="search" type="text" size="25" />
          <input class="action-button" name="go" value="Search" type="submit" />
          <input name="title" value="Special:Search" type="hidden" />
        </form>
      </div>
      
    </div>
    
    <blockquote>"Ive spent a third of my life building software 
based on Stallmans <a href="https://gnu.org/philosophy/free-sw.html">four 
freedoms</a>, and Ive been astonished by the results. WordPress 
wouldnt be here if it werent for those freedoms, and it couldnt have 
evolved the way it has." - <a href="/working-together/profiles/matt-mullenweg">Matt 
Mullenweg</a>, co-founder of WordPress</blockquote>
    
    <h2 class="section-header">

    </h2>

        <li><a href="http://my.fsf.org/donate/privacypolicy.html">Privacy Policy</a></li>
